content:
Here's a markdown table with the automated formular prompts and long-tail keywords for the UI process:

| Step | Prompt | Keywords | Long-Tail Keywords | Examples |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Product Characteristics | What is your product? | Product | Software, App, Service, Gadget | Email client, Fitness tracker, Ride-hailing app |
| Description | What is your product description? | Description | Overview, Explanation, Summary | A brief explanation of the features and benefits of a new smartphone |
| Product Name | What is your product name? | Product Name | Label, Title, Naming | PixelPhone, FitBit, Uber |
| Brand Name | What is your brand name? | Brand Name | Identity, Image, Reputation | Google, Nike, Coca-Cola |
| Logo Guideline | Do you want a guideline for logo? | Logo, Guideline | Symbol, Icon, Mark | A set of rules and guidelines for creating a consistent and recognizable logo |
| - | Choose style for logo | Logo, Style | Modern, Classic, Minimalistic | A sleek and modern logo design with a minimalist color palette |
| - | Pick some logos you like (examples) | Logo, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples | The logos of tech companies like Apple and Tesla |
| Cl Guideline | Do you want a guideline for Cl? | Cl, Guideline | Layout, Color, Typography | A set of rules and guidelines for creating a consistent and recognizable Cl |
| - | Choose Cl style | Cl, Style | Bold, Simple, Eye-catching | A bold and eye-catching Cl design with a simple color palette |
| - | Pick some Cl banners you like (examples) | Cl, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples | The Cl banners of sports brands like Adidas and Under Armour |
| Banner Guideline | Do you want a guideline for banner? | Banner, Guideline | Size, Shape, Content | A set of rules and guidelines for creating a consistent and effective banner |
| - | Choose banner style | Banner, Style | Dynamic, Static, Animated | A dynamic and animated banner design with a modern look and feel |
| - | Pick some banners you like (examples) | Banner, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples | The banners of e-commerce websites like Amazon and eBay |
| Create Website | Do you want to create a website? | Website, Create | Online, Presence, Platform | A platform for showcasing your brand and products online |
| - | Choose domain name | Domain, Name | Unique, Memorable, Short | A short and memorable domain name that is easy to remember and type |
| Web hosting | Do you have a web hosting? | Web hosting | Space, Bandwidth, Server | A service that provides the space and resources needed to host your website |
| Type of website | Choose your website type | Website, Type | Blog, Portfolio, E-commerce | A website that showcases your portfolio and work as a creative professional |
| Choose CMS platform | Choose a CMS platform | CMS, Platform | WordPress, Shopify, Wix | A platform that makes it easy to manage and update your website content |
| Website Guideline | Do you want a guideline for website theme? | Website, Guideline, Theme | Look, Feel, Design | A set of rules and guidelines for creating a consistent and effective website theme |
| - | Choose website theme | Website, Theme | Sleek, Professional, User-friendly | A sleek and professional website theme with a user |
